Meetings.Raw: JANUARY 23rd, 3.30 to 6. 58, Victoria Street, S.W. Chair: Mrs. THEODORE WILLIAMS. A. MAUDE ROYDEN (on "A Suffragist's Impressions of America"), Miss FRANCES STERLING. Discussion Invited
JANUARY 23rd Eccles Town Hall Dramatic Entertainment

FEBRUARY 23rd Albert Hall The arrangements for the Albert Hall meeting on Friday, February 23rd, are proceeding rapidly, and it seems probable that the hall will be full to overflowing. Applications for seats should be sent immediately to Miss Strachey, 58, Victoria Street, S. W.
